title: Abilene man, 33, indicted in wake of fatal accidental shooting
content:
ABILENE, Texas - A Taylor County grand jury indicted Demetrias McDonald, 33, on an unlawful possession of a firearm by a felon charge after a toddler was accidentally shot with his shotgun.
The shooting happened in the 500 block of Washington Street on May 30. A 3-year-old girl was found dead in her home. Her mother, 7-year-old sibling, and McDonald were at the home at the time of the shooting, according to Abilene police.
Police said the shooting appeared to be an accident.
